text:
EFL Special Seat Pep Guardiola: Manchester City boss on verge of joining Champions League elite as he looks to storm past Monaco 
Spanish tactician ready to take the game to free-scoring Ligue 1 giants as City look to build on 5-3 win from first leg By Martin Blackburn 15th March 2017, 12:03 am Updated: 15th March 2017, 12:20 am
